user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
last_action: click on the search bar located at the upper middle part of the screen.
reflect_result: By clicking on the search bar located at the upper middle part of the screen, the current screen now allows you to enter a search query. This action helps make progress toward the user request, as entering "MacBook Air" in the search bar will lead to the product listing, allowing you to add it to the shopping cart on Amazon. The next step is to search for the product and then proceed to add it to the cart.
